metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0132 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Inappropriate implementation in in Permission prompts in Google Chrome onWindows prior to 109.0.5414.74 allowed a remote attacker to forceacceptance of a permission prompt via a crafted HTML page. (Chromiumsecurity severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
